value:
Sharena is quite good humored, don't
you agree? Perhaps I'll invite her and
Lissa both for tea...

I'm with a group known as the
Shepherds. A noblewoman such as
myself must help preserve the peace.

You always seem so busy. Please,
leave the patrols to me.$k$pI shall deliver a sound thrashing to
any unsavory individuals I should
happen across.

Awright then, pet? Everythin' luvverly
jubberly, ain't it?$k$pWhy are you giving me that ghastly
look? I was merely practicing slang
used by commoners in my homeland.

Of course studying is expected of a
noblewoman, but I do it so I can fulfill
my dream of becoming a magistrate.

Stand up straight! I've come all this
way with a gift from your friend
$Nf.$k$pThe very least you could do is look
presentable when you accept it.

One step closer and I'll be forced
to maim you.

Results such as these are rather easy
for me to come by.
This is completely unacceptable.

I'll perform even more brilliantly
from now on.

I am Maribelle, of the Shepherds.
I will lend you my aid if you so desire.

Goodness me, that slack posture of
yours simply will not do. Aren't you
some sort of great hero in this world?$k$pThen you should carry yourself
accordingly.$k$pYou must straighten your neck like
so, and puff out your chest with
pride. No, no, that is ALL wrong!$k$pImagine yourself bound tightly to a
rod that keeps you stiff from head
to toe.$k$pWell! I see you can do it if you truly
apply yourself. I suppose you have a
decent base to work from...$k$pEven just a tiny improvement can
make a world of difference.$k$pAs a noblewoman, I do not care to
follow anyone who lacks the proper
decorum. You, however...$k$pEven as you are now, I would follow
you to the end.$k$pNow, let us have a small break and
partake of some tea, shall we? I use
only the highest quality herbs.$k$pAnd since you did so well with your
posture, I won't even scold you for
your dreadful tea-drinking manners!
はいっ！
それっ！
きゃあ！
なんと野蛮な…！
Big mistake.
I will RUIN you!
I'm afraid you're dead meat.
You have angered me. C'mere!
You brute.
うふふ
Mind how you play!
I want you at your very best!
Tell me, is Lissa here? She's a dear friend of mine.
You touched me! Without saying a thing! Do people in your world consider that some sort of greeting?
Your summoning skills are so valuable. I have to admit—they're very impressive!
Hmm. Perhaps a tea party is just the thing!
If you have a sincere desire to improve your bearing, I'll take it on myself to instruct you.
Yes.
Onward!
I'll do it!
